不过游戏还是很好的利用传送枪来解密真的好玩。

Imo, best game of all time. The story line is phenominal, along with the voice acting, music, graphics, etc. I entirely recommend this game, i think it might be the only game i have ever finished.

Jedna z tych produkcji które trzeba przejść aby móc nazywać się prawdziwym graczem. Gra mimo faktu iż minęło dużo czasu od produkcji, gra w dalszym ciągu zachwyca wielkością i rozmachem oraz idealnie wyliczonym poziomem trudności. Polecam ją absolutnie każdej osobie oczekującej od gier wymagającego poziomu trudności i dobrze napisanej fabuły a także uczucia nostalgii po przejściu jej.
A very nice, well made game. The only downside for ne is the game is quite short. Was almost sad it ended, especially so when glados sings want you gone. Still, it's a good game.

Хорошая головоломка с интересным сюжетом. Сюжет очень завлёк и был интересен. Хорош ещё и совместный режим - можно играть с другом и проходить Co-op миссии. Но самым шикарным стало то, что можно играть в пользовательские тесты в мастерской и в т. ч. выставлять свои! Великолепная головоловка (как и 1-я часть), поэтому однозначно рекомендую!
Интересный сюжет, увлекательный геймплей, ты в этой игре думаешь как пойти и просто хорошая игра.
非常有挑戰性的經典遊戲

Очень классная игра, затягивает. Сейчас на 5 главе. С каждой главой уровни все труднее и труднее.Иногда бывает что застревает на одном уровне по 30 минут.В 5 главе надо проходить уже не комнаты, а идти по огромной фабрике.Если хотели приобрести, то смело покупайте, не пожалеете!!!
Давно хотел в неё поиграть, она стоит своих денег, и это лучший кооператив, ориентированный на командную работу

我喜欢glados，我也喜欢小惠特利，喜欢小雪儿，喜欢小炮塔，喜欢两个机器人，喜欢同伴方块——

A very fun, atmospheric puzzle game. Features a single and cooperative game mode, and both are very fun with a good story. A big bonus is also it has a level editor so you can make your own levels and play levels others have made. This makes the game very replayable. Would rate 10/10.

无论是剧情还是操作，都是我喜欢的
五星好评

An amazing sequel to a revolutionary puzzle game, Portal. 

TL;DR: Funny puzzle game with a workshop that you can play with friends

You are playing as Chell, a test subject who tests at Aperture Science, or at least, tested. The facility was abandoned and you work with a mechanical "core" named Wheatley, to escape. But, to escape, you have to solve puzzles using your portal gun, a gun which shoots portals, obviously, that can transport you from one place to another, obviously. But, the game adds in new elements which makes it more challenging/fun. The mechanics of this game are amazing, using physics and different types of objects you can interact with to solve puzzles. 

But, that's only the campaign. Don't forget about Co-op!
In Co-op, you work with another person, either a friend or a random person online, to solve puzzles and complete the main Co-op story. Co-op is basically just the main game, but with an extra person and extra things to do. It also adds a few new elements to make it more challenging as you go on, like the campaign. Personally, I love Co-op because me and my friends can mess around and have fun.

Oh, you thought that was it? This is a Valve game, so it wouldn't be complete unless there was a workshop!
The community workshop, yup. You can play through levels other people have made using the in-game level editor or through hammer. Oh, yeah, the in-game level editor. No fancy programs or anything special, just a simple editor that I learned in under 10 minutes. It's basically a click-and-drag editor, but, with enough practice, you can make advanced levels that are very challenging! (Don't look at my puzzles, they're terrible.) The workshop isn't only for singleplayer though, it's also for co-op! Yup, you heard me, a level editor for co-op levels. You can have a lot of fun making your own levels and playing other user's levels. 

In conclusion, Portal 2 is a fun puzzle game that sports many features including the workshop and co-op support.
I recommend it, a lot.

Franchement, l'un de mes jeux préférés, l'histoire est complète et si comme moi, on explore bien tout le jeu y'en a pour une bonne dizaine d'heures de jeu. Certains niveaux assez compliqués mais on finit par y arriver. Et avec ça, le workshop, qui nous permet de partager nos niveaux et jouer à ceux des autres. Pour moi, l'un des meilleurs jeu de steam.

I remember owning this game for the PS3, and it's so good I decided to re-buy it. Amazing story to an amazing series.

The original Portal game was already an amazing game, but this one is even better. Sadly, it turned out to be Valve's last great masterpiece. I don't have anything bad to say about Portal 2. Even though this game uses the old Source engine, it somehow produces gorgeous graphics that still look great today, and even low end pc's shouldn't have problems running it these days.

Good things about this game: A good story that doesn't take itself too seriously. Great characters and dialogue. Takes place in the same universe as Half-Life series. Challenging puzzles but not too difficult. Longer than Portal 1. A great co-op campaign that is incredibly fun to play with a friend. Fit for play for almost anyone, as there's almost no violence at all, and even when there is, it's done in a harmless cartoony style. Beautiful graphics and level design.
10/10 does anything else even need to be said at this point?
Рекомендую!
